hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that #Zora's River# is on the path to the #Shadow Medallion#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Heart Container# and #a Wallet#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: The hint stone you have dialed&has been disconnected.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Piece of Heart#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Trail## has #1# major item.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found at #the Desert Colossus#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that #King Dodongo# holds...^ #a Red Rupee# and #the Claim Check#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Bottom of the Well## has #1# major item.

HC (Malon).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Purple Rupee#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that #outside Ganon's Castle# is on the way of the hero.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that #collecting cuccos# rewards #Epona's Song#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides a small #Fairy Fountain#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Piece of Heart#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Ocarina C left Button# can be found in #Kokiri Forest#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that #a Piece of Heart# can be found in #the Market#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that an #invisible spinning blade# in the Shadow Temple guards...^ #a Shadow Temple Compass# and #a Blue Rupee#.
hinted_locations: Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Visible Chest
Shadow Temple Invisible Blades Invisible Chest

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is a foolish choice.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that #a Poe Bottle# can be found at #Gerudo Valley#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that the song taught by the #Ocarina of Time# is #a Purple Rupee#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #the Shadow Temple# hoards #a Map of the Shadow Temple#.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Strength Upgrade#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Field# is on the path to #the Key#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that lifting a #rock in the desert# reveals a #Big Skulltula# guarding a Gold one.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that ##the Fire Temple## has #2# major items.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that showing the #Claim Check to Biggoron# rewards #a Purple Rupee#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: Twenty-three is number one!^And thirty-one is number two!

ToT (Right).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals a #generic grotto#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the path to #Evil's Bane#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Green Rupee# and #an Ice Cavern Compass#.

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that plundering #the Temple of Time# is a foolish choice.
